description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent for generating movie scripts with a Cohere model, and runs the agent to get a response.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Method of Agent class to execute the agent with a prompt and obtain a response.
